title: ID Font: Added Font: Eye of Judgment. identify 3 fonts
content:
I’m looking to identify the two major fonts used for Sony’s PS3 game Eye of Judgment, the first being the logo and the second being the print used for their website. [http://www.eyeofjudgment.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20080830035816/http:/www.eyeofjudgment.com/ "http://www.eyeofjudgment.com")

the font used on their website is common, but haven’t been able to track down the exact font.

see my most recent post for the third font that I could use some help identifying.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [eyeofjudgmentlogo.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080830035816/http:/typophile.com/files/eyeofjudgmentlogo.jpg) | 29.46 KB |
| [identifyFont.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20080830035816/http:/typophile.com/files/identifyFont.png) | 17.83 KB |

 [‹ ID: humanist serif from Elle Decor](http://web.archive.org/web/20080830035816/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45141 "Go to previous forum topic") [Slovene font :: PLEASE HELP ME !! ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080830035816/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45140 "Go to next forum topic")
author: fontainne

comments.content:
okay, I’ve got a third typeface I need to identify in relation to these two, any help would be great!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080830035816im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/identifyFont_5536.png)
